review: Who wouldn't recommend an Apple TV??  This thing is great and I am well on my way to ditching cable all together.  If they can figure out a way to get NFL games on this thing it's game over for DirecTV at my house.
author: ryan feldman

review: First, it works very poorly, even with good signal strength using the ipad AirPlay is terrible. Extreme time lag making viewing impossible. Second, every channel is a pay channel, yes, there are 5000 choices....for a price. Just not worth it, get a small PC with a remote keyboard and save yourself the aggravation!
